title: Paper plates to silver spoons: the complete guide to table manners
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Manners and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Etiquette
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food habits
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Manners and customs
description: Designed as a quick guide to table manners, this American production will amuse and inform. Table manners, utensil use, correct posture and table settings are discussed for both formal and informal dining situations. Cultural differences in table manners are also discussed. After watching this, viewers will be able to handle any dining situation with confidence as well as learning when it is acceptable to put elbows on the table and eat with one's fingers!
